# myshop Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-10

## Active Technologies
- PHP 8.3+ + Symfony 7.3, Doctrine ORM, MongoDB PHP Driver, Redis/Predis, RabbitMQ (001-cicd-pipeline)
- MySQL 8.0 (primary), MongoDB (embeddings/search), Redis (cache/sessions) (001-cicd-pipeline)

- PHP 8.3 + Symfony 7.3 (Framework Bundle, Messenger), RabbitMQ (AMQP), MongoDB PHP Library 2.0, OpenAI PHP Client (for embeddings), Doctrine ORM (for MySQL) (014-user-embeddings-queue)
